welcome.title: Start learning to drive
welcome.subtitle: Free anxiety test will help us find the perfect approach
welcome.nameMinLength: Name must contain at least 2 characters
welcome.processStep1: After entering your name, you will take a short anxiety test
welcome.processStep2: We will select a suitable instructor based on your answers
welcome.processStep3: You will be able to choose a convenient time for the first lesson
welcome.processStep4: All data is confidential and used only for program selection

anxiety.title: Rate your anxiety
anxiety.subtitle: This will help us find the right approach

menu.selectInstructorDesc: Find the perfect instructor for you
menu.testimonialsDesc: Learn success stories of other students
menu.supportDesc: Get help and answers to your questions
menu.recommendation: We recommend starting with instructor selection
menu.recommendationText: Choose an instructor and sign up for the first lesson - it will only take 2 minutes
menu.reactionTitle: You are already on the right path!

progress.subtitle: Learning progress

progress.skillHint: Click on a skill to mark it as mastered
progress.readyForExam: Ready for the exam and getting your license

start.title: Start your journey to freedom!
start.message: The first lesson is the first step to independence. You're already on the right path!

beginning.title: Great start!
beginning.message: You've already started! Each lesson brings you closer to getting your license.

quarter.title: You're a quarter of the way!
quarter.message: Keep it up! You're making great progress.

halfway.title: More than half done!
halfway.message: You've already mastered more than half of the program. Not much left!

final.title: Final stretch!
final.message: You're almost there! Just a few more lessons until you get your license.

complete.title: Congratulations!
complete.message: You've completed all lessons! Ready for the exam and getting your license!

testimonials.title: Success stories
testimonials.motivation: All these people were also afraid to drive, but they managed!
testimonials.reviewPlaceholder: Tell us about your learning experience, what you liked, how the instructor helped you...
testimonials.thanks: Thank you for your review! It will be published after moderation.

stats.title: Our statistics
stats.passRate: 94% of students pass the exam on the first try
stats.continue: 89% continue driving after getting their license

support.title: Support
support.highAnxiety: We understand it's hard for you. You're getting special support!
support.normalAnxiety: It's normal to be a little worried. We'll help!
support.tipTitle: üí° Tip of the day before lesson
tips: Breathe deeply before starting the lesson - 4 seconds inhale, 6 seconds exhale
Remember: mistakes are part of learning, don't blame yourself
Visualize successful execution of the maneuver before performing it
If you feel panic - tell the instructor, we'll stop and breathe
support.panicQuestion: What to do if I panic while driving?
support.panicAnswer: Tell the instructor "STOP". We'll stop, you'll breathe, and continue when you're ready. Panic is normal at first.
support.examFearQuestion: How to deal with exam fear?
support.examFearAnswer: We conduct a trial exam on the same route. You'll know every turn. Plus, the instructor can go with you for moral support.
support.changeInstructorAnswer: Of course! If you feel uncomfortable - tell us, we'll find another instructor for you at no extra charge.
support.info: Describe your situation, fears or questions. Our psychologist will respond within 24 hours.
support.messagePlaceholder: For example: I'm very afraid to drive, especially on busy streets. What should I do?
support.thanks: Thank you for your message! The psychologist will respond within 24 hours.

booking.title: Book a lesson
booking.info: After submitting the request, we will contact you to confirm the lesson time.
booking.pastDate: Cannot book a lesson in the past

bookingSuccess.title: Excellent!
bookingSuccess.subtitle: You have successfully booked a lesson
bookingSuccess.nextStepsText: We will contact you shortly to confirm the lesson time. Check your contacts so you don't miss our call or message.

errors.bookingFailed: Failed to book lesson. Please try again later.
errors.sendReviewFailed: Failed to send review. Please try again later.
errors.sendMessageFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
